title: Buffett's company reports 37% drop
text:
Sat, Aug 8, 2015, 9:57 AM AEST - Australia Markets closed Buffett's company reports 37% drop AAP – 16 minutes ago View Photo 

Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has reported a 37 per cent drop in its second-quarter profit as the paper value of its investments fell and its insurance companies reported an underwriting loss. 
Berkshire Hathaway's net income fell to $US4.01 billion ($A5.46 billion), or $US2442 per Class A share. That's down from last year's $US6.4 billion, or $US3889 per share. Those results were helped by a $US1.1 billion paper gain on a stock exchange deal. 
Revenue grew three per cent to $US51.4 billion. 
The four analysts surveyed by FactSet expected Berkshire to report operating earnings per Class A share of $US2997.14.
